climbs.name: The Vegan
climbs.fa: Levi Van Buggenum and Chris Maze

content.description: A closely bolted clip up perfect for leaders breaking into the grade. Low angle slab on big holds leads to a small ledge. Scout the crux above and pull on big pockets. The grade and difficulty ease prior to one final move below the anchors.
content.location: Left most route at Snag Wall

climbs.name: Upper Snag
climbs.fa: Mike Board, Kelly Boyd, Steve Edwards and Mick Pattison

content.description: Climb small pockets to bolt above anchors on Snag. Transition into small roof/dihedral, follow crack to two bolts above.
Bolts follow a discontinuous right facing feature to pockets and edges above. A full value romp using all sorts of movement. Never too far from a big hold.
content.location: Middle sport route on this section.

content.description: Clip first bolt on Gray Lady Down to protect the anchor. Traverse into crack. Follow crack on bomber finger locks and chert edges to top, clipping a bolt about half way. Small to medium nuts work better than cams on this pitch.
content.protection: Small gear, especially small and medium nuts. A single bolt gives a boost of confidence at the halfway mark.

climbs.name: Towhee
climbs.fa: J Feeley, M Pattinson and M Board

content.description: Pockets and chert nubbins lead to chains. Turns Gopher Baroque and American Express into nice long pitches. 70m rope required for lowering from the top anchors.
content.protection: 4 bolts and a couple small cams to chains
content.location: An extension to Gopher Baroque or American Express.

content.description: A wonderful crack with excellent nutting.  Face holds ease the difficulty and rests are plenty. Best 5.7 in the canyon. Finish at chains and good stance on left.

climbs.name: Pair of Loaded Guns
climbs.fa: Kelly Boyd, Mick Pattison, Mike Board

content.description: Follow bolts up pocketed goodness to thinner edging above.
content.protection: 7 bolts to chains atop Trail Boss.
content.location: Start at tree blocking trail to Snag. Left most sport route on this section of wall.

content.description: Follow flake system up through bushes and loose rock to the anchors atop Snag, which you should have done instead.
A great extension to Trail Boss. Pockets and crimps that get progressively harder as you approach the chains.
content.protection: 8 bolts, 17 bolts if you start with Trail Boss.

climbs.name: Gopher Baroque
climbs.fa: M Pattinson, M Board and J Feeley

content.description: Climb over a small roof then up small pockets to chains. Continue up Towhee for a nice long pitch.
content.location: The bolt line just left of the vegetated LF dihedral on the right side of the wall.

content.description: Climb into the dihedral with a tricky stand up move. Easier climbing leads to the crux bulge before the anchors.  Continue up Towhee for a nice long pitch.
content.location: Start up the small dihedral in the center of the right side of the wall.
